thread.title: BRIEF-VR Global Partners LP Reports 5.2 Pct Stake In Resolute Energy Corp As Of Feb 5

title: BRIEF-VR Global Partners LP Reports 5.2 Pct Stake In Resolute Energy Corp As Of Feb 5

organizations.name: pct stake in resolute energy corp

text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Resolute Energy Corp:
* VR GLOBAL PARTNERS LP REPORTS 5.2 PERCENT STAKE IN RESOLUTE ENERGY CORP AS OF FEB 5 - SEC FILING
* VR GLOBAL PARTNERS LP SAYS ACQUIRED RESOLUTE ENERGYâ€˜S COMMON STOCK FOR INVESTMENT PURPOSES AND BELIEVED REPRESENTED ATTRACTIVE INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY
* VR GLOBAL PARTNERS-IN SUPPORT OF MONARCH ALTERNATIVE'S PROPOSAL CALLING FOR RESOLUTE ENERGY TO HIRE ADVISOR TO ASSIST BOARD FOR POTENTIAL STRATEGIC TRANSACTIONS Source text: [ bit.ly/2E8y8Td ] Further company coverage:
